Legal Notice

1. Identifying Information

In compliance with Article 10 of Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce, the following information is provided:

Website Owner:

  • Company Name: SESEC
  • Activity: Cybersecurity Consulting
  • Address: Spain
  • Email: info@sesecpro.com
  • Phone: +34 XXX XXX XXX
  • Website: www.sesecpro.com

2. Purpose

This legal notice governs the use of the website www.sesecpro.com (hereinafter, "the website"), owned by SESEC.

Navigation of the website grants the user status and implies full and unreserved acceptance of each and every provision included in this legal notice.

3. Terms of Use

3.1 Authorized Use

The website provides information about SESEC's cybersecurity consulting services. The user agrees to:

  • Make appropriate and lawful use of the website
  • Not use the website for illegal or unauthorized purposes
  • Not damage, disable, or overload the website
  • Not introduce viruses or malicious code
  • Respect intellectual property rights

3.2 Prohibited Use

The following is expressly prohibited:

  • Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or modification of content
  • Use of the website for unauthorized commercial activities
  • Systematic data extraction using robots or similar tools
  • Any action that may damage SESEC's image or reputation

4. Content

4.1 General Information

The contents of this website are merely informative. SESEC strives to keep information updated but does not guarantee its accuracy, completeness, or timeliness.

4.2 Modifications

SESEC reserves the right to modify, update, or remove website content without prior notice.

5. Intellectual and Industrial Property

All website content (texts, images, sounds, audio, video, software, technologies, graphic designs, source code, etc.) is the property of SESEC or third parties who have authorized its use.

Intellectual and industrial property rights are protected by applicable Spanish and international laws.

Reproduction, distribution, public communication, transformation, or any other activity that may be performed with the content without express authorization from SESEC is prohibited.

6. External Links

The website may contain links to third-party websites. SESEC is not responsible for the content, privacy policies, or practices of these external sites.

The inclusion of links does not imply approval or recommendation by SESEC.

7. Limitation of Liability

7.1 Service Availability

SESEC does not guarantee continuous website availability and is not responsible for service interruptions due to maintenance, technical failures, or causes beyond its control.

7.2 Content

SESEC is not responsible for:

  • Errors or omissions in content
  • Damages arising from information use
  • Decisions made based on website information
  • Viruses or harmful elements that may affect computer equipment

8. Data Protection

Personal data processing is governed by our Privacy Policy, which complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable Spanish legislation.

9. Cookies

The website uses cookies as described in our Cookie Policy.

10. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

This legal notice is governed by Spanish law. For the resolution of any controversy, the parties submit to the competent Spanish courts and tribunals.

11. Contact

For any inquiries related to this legal notice:

  • Email: legal@sesecpro.com
  • Phone: +34 XXX XXX XXX
  • Postal Address: Spain

12. Validity

This legal notice will remain in effect until modified by another duly published notice.
